snippet.title: Haunted Paws: Official Early Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Just in time for Halloween, the cozy co-op horror game Haunted Paws – in which you play as dogs trying to save their human friend in a haunted mansion – shows off some early gameplay in this new trailer. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2861080/Haunted_Paws/

#IGN #Gaming
